title: 44.4 (LOA)
content:
Kordo smiles at you. “Well? What say we push off up that way? I think I remember a sinkhole past those hills; maybe it’s deep enough to take us into the arcology?”

RANGERS CHOOSE

A) Continue helping Kordo search for a sinkhole. Discard all   from Kordo.

B) Say goodbye for now. Discard Kordo. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
